hints.title: Deflection
hints.description: Tip: To deflect a laser beam, place a mirror in its path. Mirrors can face one of two directions.

hints.title: Spin Doctor
hints.description: Tip: Use a wernch to rotate a mirror or a laser. There are two types of wrenches: clockwise and counterclockwise.

hints.title: House of Mirrors
hints.description: Tip: Dweep can pick up items in green squares to add to your inventory. Pick up lasers, and use them to destroy other lasers

hints.title: Bombing Alley
hints.description: Tip: A torch or a laser can light a bomb`s fuse. An exploding bomb will cause adjacent bombs to explode as well.

hints.title: Dexterity
hints.description: Tip: An exploding bomb will destroy all adjacent object, including lasers, mirrors, and other bombs

hints.title: Lasermania
hints.description: Tip: If Dweep steps on a freeze plate, Dweep will freeze and will be unable to move. Avoid the freeze plates here.

hints.title: Phoenix
hints.description: Tip: Use a water bucket to make Dweep wet. A wet Dweep can pass through a single laser beam unharmed. Do not stop in the beam.

hints.title: Squish Time
hints.description: Tip: Use a torch to thaw a frozen Dweep.

hints.title: Badda Bing
hints.description: Tip: A water bucket can defuse an ignited bomb before it explodes, but if a laser beam is still passing through the bomb`s fuse, the bomb will re-ignite.

hints.title: A Torch in the Hand
hints.description: Tip: If your inventory is full, Dweep cannot pick up any more items.

hints.title: Fear No Lasers
hints.description: Tip: Dweep can move diagonally as well as vertically and horizontally.
